reviews.name: Juiceman All-in-One Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: I AM 72 YEARS OLD AND I'VE BEEN USING THE JUICEMAN OVER 30 YEARS. THE PRODUCT IS LIGHTER, EASY TO CLEAN WITH POWERFUL MOTOR. THE JUICING RESULTS ARE GREAT. I CAN SEE WHY CONSUMER REPORTS RECOMMENDED IT.
reviews.title: HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT

reviews.name: Juiceman All-in-One Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: Fast shipment! Good service! Product arrived in excellent shape. I'm satisfied!
reviews.title: Useful! Great quality!

reviews.name: Juiceman All-in-One Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a juice extractor that is easy to operate and clean (user friendly), compact but powerful as I have very limited counter space. The Juiceman fits the bill. I am juicing away. I am quite happy with this product and will recommend it to family and friends.
reviews.title: Perfect for me

reviews.name: Juiceman All-in-One Juice Extractor
reviews.reviewText:
I am quite happy with this purchase. The juicer is well-constructed, juices efficiently, and is relatively easy to clean. The blade/filter always takes a little added effort, to clean out the little pinholes, but is no real problem.

A certain consumer ratings magazine ranked this as their first choice, over models that cost a lot more. The "Juiceman" knew what he was doing when he put his name on this device.

I heartily recommend it.
reviews.title: Highly Rated and Works Very Well
